content: knit-look crocheted poppy design by lisa van klaveren 8 ply size 3 email lisa@hollanddesignscrochet com © holland designs crochet this pattern is written in standard american crochet terms stitch demo video available here https //youtu be/lp9hvkmzytw skill level finished size sample flowers measured 3 & 2 5 wide if you wish to make a smaller flower center try working only 5 single_crochet on round 1 and increasing to 10 single_crochet on round 2 to make shorter petals work chain 4 to begin row 1 of petals materials you may use yarn and hook of choice dk or light worsted weight yarn small amounts crochet hook size f 3 75 mm yarn needle to weave in ends hair clip or fastener optional flower center round 1 with black make a magic_ring insert hook in ring yo pull up a loop chain 1 6 single_crochet in ring 6 single_crochet do not join work continuously in rnds round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet and fasten_off black petals worked in short row around entire flower center row 1 join red with slip_stitch in any single_crochet of round 2 of flower center chain 5 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in next 3 chain slip_stitch in next single_crochet of round 2 of flower center turn 4 half_double_crochet row 2 working in back loops only half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet across chain 1 turn 4 half_double_crochet row 3 working in back loops only half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet across slip_stitch in next single_crochet of round 2 of flower center turn 4 half_double_crochet row 4-24 repeat row 2 & 3 ending with a repetition of row 2 if you had 10 single_crochet on row 2 of the flower center you will have only 20 row hair clip loop optional slip_stitch in back loop only of each half_double_crochet across last row of petals slip_stitch at base of beg chain of row 1 turn so back of flower center is facing chain 5 join with slip_stitch at opposite side of flower center work a 2nd joining slip_stitch to secure the loop turn half_double_crochet in each chain across join with slip_stitch near base of starting chain of flower petals to secure fasten_off leaving a longer length of yarn for sewing with yarn needle sew ends of row of petals together with whip stitch weave in ends copyright this pattern may be printed
